about_the_game:
Tourist Edition Upgrade
You've been asking for it, so HERE YOU GO! Get the Tourist Edition items of The Walking Dead: Saints & Sinners with this Tourist Edition Upgrade bundle! You'll receive three unique weapon recipes (The Sheriff, The Judge, and the National Guard Knife), collectible voodoo dolls, the game's soundtrack, and The Supernatural Skeptic's Guide to New Orleans companion piece.

content_descriptors.notes: Main game has the following: Intense Violence, Blood and Gore, Use of Alcohol, Strong Language

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 8700k / AMD Ryzen 7 1800X
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070 / AMD Radeon Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 MB available space

short_description: Feeling left out? Wishing you had your own unique weapons or voodoo dolls to play with? Here's your chance! Purchase now and you'll receive: Three unique weapon recipes, collectible voodoo dolls, the game's soundtrack, and The Supernatural Skeptic's Guide to New Orleans companion piece.
